page.title: 06Education in Papa Westray
page.content: Primary school education is provided for ages 5 to 12 years on the island in a small single teacher school, though there are specialist teachers in Music, Art and Physical Education,who come at intervals for the day from Kirkwall on the inter island plane. The school building is also one of the island's venues for community events. At age 12 the children go by boat daily to the neighbouring, larger island of Westray to the Junior Secondary School. After two years they can choose to transfer to Kirkwall Grammar School to complete their secondary education. While attending Kirkwall Grammar School they stay in the school hostel and are provided with transport home one weekend in four.
